website_summaries.verdict: The ATC5K Action Camera has a few new features that make it easy to pick up and start using; however, it falls flat when it comes to video and photo quality.
pros: The ATC5K has a color LCD that makes it easy to use in the field
Its Webcam and live monitor function enhance the usefulness of the camera
Waterproof, shockproof design takes bumps and splashes in stride
cons: Front-heavy design makes the unit difficult to mount stably

customer_reviews.title: Better Waterproof Action Cam
customer_reviews.text: This model is still reasonably priced and fixed the major issues of the previous versions (accidental card removal, trashing the data and often the card) and not seeing the viewing area. The one big outstyanding issue is the small amount of internal memory. If you use theis for a long duration, the 50 seconds of internal memory is more of a hinderance when repalcing batteries, etc. Why bother ?
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Otis

customer_reviews.title: ATC-5K  by Oregon
customer_reviews.text: Pros: If you're just looking for something for the kids I guess it's ok. This is a camera you'd give your kids and say have fun, it is a poor quality camera but it works. Cons: I paid a little under a $100. and feel it's worth less. Seller: Was quick on delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This thing is good starter camera if you don't plan to use a lot of action shots. Battery life is pretty short, the sound is really bad, and visual quality is under par. I took it to the lake with my girlfriend and tried going underwater with it. There is a terrible sound that it makes when you go from above to below water. I almost thought I broke my speakers. It was real quiet ...then BOOM! Then back to quiet again. I paid 85 bucks for it, which I can see as fair, but was still a little disappointed with the features.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like it, good quality video. Work good in my helmet. the batteries AA is perfect for buy in any store in rural sites.
customer_reviews.author: ORS

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this to film fishing action shots, filmed lots of action shots works as stated no more no less,so!It's good.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lee

customer_reviews.title: Flying Video's
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this video camera. I am a pilot so I placed the camera on the the wing strut and it took some spectacular footage. It is easy to use, with many cool features. If you are an outdoors person looking for a good video camera at a fair price this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: William O. Crabbe

customer_reviews.title: Was not what I wanted but worked well and as ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I wanted but worked well and as it was supposed to. Nothing wrong with product just not what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: James Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good for some sports
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it works well and the image quality is 7/10, the audio is 3/10. Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Rashid Al Romaithi

customer_reviews.title: simple to use if i got it to work after 3x's
customer_reviews.text: this cam is so easy and simple to use and if you cant then a box of rocks is smarter . the buttons are kinda stiff but its watter proof up to 10 ft so it has to be that way . 4 GB card will give you 2 hrs of record time . its simple to hook up to your computer and put up on you tube if you wish .fast shipping from the seller .ok now after useing this for 3x's now it will NOT EVEN POWER UP I filed a dispute w/amazon about this prob.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Video Camera @ a GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This could be the best value in the marketplace on an action cam that does it all at a great price. Not to mention the convenient hands-free remote control (so you are not fumbling for buttons on your helmet) and color LCD screen for immediate playback :-)
customer_reviews.author: susan69

product_meta.title: Oregon Scientific ATC 5K Waterproof Action Cam Flash Memory Video Recorder with 1.5-Inch Color LCD Screen, Still Image and Web Cam Capabilities (Blue)
product_meta.description: Dirt, Snow, Rain, or Shine, capture all the action with the ultimate, all-terrain digital video camera! It's even WATERPROOF up to 3 meters with NO additional casing! Sporting a HUGE 53 degree Field of View, the hands free digital video and audio captures all the thrill of your adventure in 640X480 VGA resolution (up to 30 frames per second) with the 32 MB internal memory (expandable to 4GB with built-in SD drive, 4GB card not included). You can either playback all the action on the 1.5" Color LCD screen, or you can use the USB & RCA Cables included in the kit to quickly connect and relive the fun on your TV (NTSC) or PC. The ATC5K can also be used for still photography and as a webcam, making it one of the most versatile units on the market. This product comes standard with a carrying case and all the mounting accessories necessary for easy connectivity to helmets, bikes, and a wide array of other equipment. It also comes with a webcam stand, webcam installation CD and a remote. PC requirements: Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows Vista, OSX10.4 and below. (Webcam not for MAC)
feature_bullets: 32mB Internal Memory, expandable up to 4GB with built in SD drive (SD card not included)
Web Cam and Still Cam Capabilities with Stand Included (Webcam not for Mac)
All Mounting Hardware and Remote Control Included
PC requirements: Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows Vista, OS X 10.4 and below

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars25 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
